title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 5.1 - Contracts with federal aid
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 5.1 - Contracts with federal aid

State Regulations

If Federal funds are involved in the financing of a contract, a letter of authority to advertise, and a commitment of funds from the Federal

Bureau of Public Roads and a concurrence in the award from the Federal Bureau
of Public Roads are required. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง
5.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
